additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Massage into the painful area 3-4 times daily, or as required. Do not apply directly after showering. Keep out of reach of children.For external use only. Avoid direct contact with eyes and open wounds. If pain persists or skin becomes red or irritated, discontinue use and consult a doctor. Do not rub in vigorously, bandage tightly or use with a heating pad. Do not apply directly after showering. Keep away from open flame. Do not use if you are allergic to salicylates or are taking anti-coagulant medications., KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN. FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY. Avoid direct contact with eyes and open wounds. If pain persists or skin becomes red or irritated, discontinue use and consult a doctor. DO NOT rub in vigorously, bandage tightly or use with a heating pad. DO NOT apply directly after showering. Keep away from open flame. DO NOT use if you are allergic to salicylates or are taking anti-coagulant medications.

description: Dencorub Extra Strength Heat Rub Gel
name: Extra Strength Heat Rub Gel
